name: The Styx Paradox
description:
compile it from its git repos: https://github.com/peelingSun/Godot-wild-jam-9-underworld-submission

Hint: going out of the game's window is not necessarily a bug (it was intended to be an option). Although, I will take care of the issues related to this soon.

===

Co-made with @ClickheadZ (github). The theme was Underworld and the Styx idea was from ClickheadZ. He also contributed to the player movement and the Hunter's behaviour.

A small game made during the Godot Wild Jam #9 (may 2019). The Styx Paradox will include voice acting and other fundamentally useful features. Paddle your way through the fabled Styx River as you journey towards the Underworld. This is an old-school atmospheric adventure in the mythological Styx River with an experimental narrative layer.

Currently the demo version has 10 playable levels.

Will be updated again every week(s) or so.

PRE-ALPHA release v1.1-pre-alpha.
